maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/32/s.orig: A bit of advice!\. Hit them with \i[tech]charged balls to cancel their attacks!
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/32/s.text: Un petit conseil !\. Touche-les avec des \i[tech]boules chargées pour interrompre leurs attaques !

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/37/s.orig: Enter that arena there to start the lil' sparring session.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/37/s.text: Entre dans le ring pour commencer la chtite session d'entrainement.

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/37/s.orig: If you liked this room, you're gonna love the next one, trust me!
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/37/s.text: Si tu as aimé cette pièce, tu vas adorer la suivante, crois-moi !

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/42/s.orig: Yes!!\. That was awesome, girl!\. Sergey, you weren't kidding! She's really got a knack for battling.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/42/s.text: Ouais !!\. C'était génial !\. Tu n'exagérais pas Sergey ! Elle assure vraiment au combat !

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/42/s.orig: Yeah, that sure takes me back.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/42/s.text: Oui, c'est bien ce dont je me souvenais.

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: Just a short warning.\. Here you'll meet your first "real" enemies.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Juste un petit avertissement.\. Ici tu vas rencontrer tes premiers "vrais" ennemis.

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: And by "real" I mean those things will, in fact, attack you.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Et par "vrai" je veux dire que ces choses vont vraiment t'attaquer.

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: Not that it's \c[3]likely\c[0] they'll get the chance with the amount of damage you deal, but anyway...
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Bien que vu les masses de dégâts que tu fais, ils n'auront sans doute pas \c[3]l'occasion\c[0] de le faire, mais bon...

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: Don't get me wrong!\. They're really easy, but still....
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Ne le prends pas mal !\. Ils sont trop faciles, mais bon...

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: If you do get beat down, your respawn point is right in this room.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Si jamais tu perds, alors tu recommenceras à partir d'ici.

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: Uhm...\. that means there's no real danger!\. Go ahead and kick some ass!
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Euh...\. ça veut dire qu'il n'y a pas de vrai danger !\. Continue et va leur botter le derrière !

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: Ah, just a moment!\. Let me enable the dash module before we start the battle.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Hé, attends !\. Laisse-moi juste activer le module de sprint avant de commencer le combat.

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: Dash is essential in battle, since it helps you to quickly dodge enemy attacks at any time.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Le sprint est essentiel au combat, puisqu'il permet d'esquiver rapidement les attaques ennemies à n'importe quel moment.

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: Right he is!\. Now please enter to the right in order to proceed with the ass kicking.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Tu l'as entendu !\. Maintenant diriges-toi vers la droite pour commencer la distribution des coups de pieds aux fesses !

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.orig: Press \i[dash] while moving to dash, though only up to 3 times in a row. You can dash at any time, even while aiming.
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/50/s.text: Appuyez sur \i[dash] pendant un déplacement pour sprinter - mais seulement jusqu'à trois fois à la suite. Vous pouvez sprinter à n'importe quel moment, même en visant !

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/60/s.orig:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/60/s.text:
Mauvaise direction, Lea !\.
Il faut qu'on atteigne le téléporteur !

maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/71/s.orig: What is up with your damage?! We do not approve of this!!
maps/cargo-ship/room4.json/entities/71/s.text: Qu'est-ce tu as fait avec tes dégâts ?! C'est inacceptable !!
